LERCH, I want to thank you so much Mr, Woodard for discussing
Buddhism and its importance not only to Japan but to the
whole world, on this the final issue of REPORT FROM
JAPAN. And I can only hope that our listeners have
enjoyed this series as much as I have. For the last time
then, this is John Lerch In Tokyo bidding you Sayonara.
